column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////The food itself could use some work. I had a blueberry muffin which was dense and cake-like
column2: a scone that was borderline bread
column3: and biscuits & gravy that were bland and disappointing. The walnut chocolate chip cookie had a good texture
column4: but it wasn't anything to write home about. A perfectly decent cookie.
